p: In the present study, three accessions of CA were extracted with 95% denatured ethanol, and percentage of yield was calculated. The extraction yield of the three extracts of CA accessions designated as SECA-K017, SECA-K018, and SECA-K019 is shown in Table 2. Results showed that SECA-K018 gave the highest extraction yield compared to SECA-K017 and SECA-K019.
